description.narrative: By 2020, strengthened sub-national level human and institutional capacities to coordinate, monitor and evaluate Government multi- sectoral, food and nutrition security policies and action plans, which contributes to Nutrition â€“ General, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome: By 2020, Children in the first 1,000 days in high burden provinces have improved nutritional status

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, strengthened sub-national level human and institutional capacities to coordinate, monitor and evaluate Government multi- sectoral, food and nutrition security policies and action plans

description.narrative:
The programme continued to provide strong technical support to the decentralized planning and monitoring of the Action Plans for the Reduction of Chronic Undernutrition (PAMRDC), in Nampula and Zambezia provinces and in the seven focus districts of the programme. Progress is being made in strengthening the capacities of service providers at the national, provincial and district level with additional technical staff, the development of district plans, support to reporting and monitoring systems and the procurement of vehicles and equipment.
| Status:On-track | As-of Date:09/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of mid-level district nutritionists received refresher training in planning and management of nutrition action within the last 2 years

Existence of a functional national multisectoral committee for nutrition
